mutants.code:
def calculate_sales_tax(price, tax_rate):
    rounded_tax_rate = round(tax_rate, 2)
    sales_tax = price / rounded_tax_rate
    return sales_tax

def calculate_sales_tax(price, tax_rate):
    rounded_tax_rate = round(tax_rate, 2)
    sales_tax = price + rounded_tax_rate
    return sales_tax

def calculate_sales_tax(price, tax_rate):
    rounded_tax_rate = round(tax_rate, 2)
    sales_tax = price ** rounded_tax_rate
    return sales_tax

def calculate_sales_tax(price, tax_rate):
    rounded_tax_rate = round(tax_rate, 3)
    sales_tax = price * rounded_tax_rate
    return sales_tax

def calculate_sales_tax(price, tax_rate):
    rounded_tax_rate = round(tax_rate, 1)
    sales_tax = price * rounded_tax_rate
    return sales_tax

def calculate_sales_tax(price, tax_rate):
    rounded_tax_rate = round(tax_rate, 0)
    sales_tax = price * rounded_tax_rate
    return sales_tax

def calculate_sales_tax(price, tax_rate):
    rounded_tax_rate = round(tax_rate, 1)
    sales_tax = price * rounded_tax_rate
    return sales_tax

def calculate_sales_tax(price, tax_rate):
    rounded_tax_rate = round(tax_rate, -2)
    sales_tax = price * rounded_tax_rate
    return sales_tax
